activities: Westfield Corporation is one of the world’s leading shopping centre companies, with multiple retail destinations, including within the UK. Westfield Corporation and Westfield Corporation’s controlled US subsidiaries use personal information that it receives from the EU primarily for (1) customer support activities, such as providing technical support and improving product offerings; (2) sales and marketing activities as permissible under applicable law; (3) enabling and providing services online, such as customer logins and concierge experiences; (4) internal business processes such as processing of payments, fraud detection and prevention, and compliance with governmental, legislative, and regulatory bodies.
